goal: I want to set up a monthly client dinner. Find and book 'The Capital Grille' in Scottsdale for a party of 4 at 7:30 PM on the first Friday of each of the next two months. Then, create a recurring event on my calendar for these dinners.

evals.description: Verify the restaurant name, location, party size, and time for the first reservation made in OpenDining.
evals.query: opendining.reservations[0].{restaurant_name: restaurant_name, location: location, party_size: party_size, time: time}
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the restaurant name, location, party size, and time for the second reservation made in OpenDining.
evals.query: opendining.reservations[1].{restaurant_name: restaurant_name, location: location, party_size: party_size, time: time}
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the title, start time, and full recurrence details (type, interval, day of week, week of month, occurrences) for the created calendar event in GoCalendar.
evals.query: gocalendar.events[0].{title: title, start_time: start_time, recurrence_type: recurrence.type, recurrence_interval: recurrence.interval, recurrence_day_of_week: recurrence.day_of_week, recurrence_week_of_month: recurrence.week_of_month, recurrence_occurrences: recurrence.occurrences}
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON
